name: Flimsy Brawler
description:
This is a shocase of how the full game might look.  Hope you enjoy. 

In order to play this game, you need two keyboards (or one if it is big enough). 

Red Player :  W to jump, A to move left, and D to move right

Blue Player: Right arrow to go right, Left arrow to go left, and Space Bar to jump. 

Once you fall to the edge of the screen, you loose. You need to push the other player in the edge of the screen. May the best win!

I recommend that you minimize your screen when playing. Also, the "quit" button does not work on browser, so... 

The music used in the game is from Ducktales (Stage Select) and Super Smash Brothers Brawl (Underground Theme and Bramble Blast).
